Soul Enrichment

Soul Enrichment is the process by which an Atman is enriched or marred during participation in a trinity. The exact effect of this in unseen in True Creation, where all is unchanging, but the balance of True Creation is dependant upon the final state of Atman at the collapse of a Creation.

The enrichment of an Atman contrbutes directly to its capacity for Mana production, allowing an Atman to move between being Divine, Mortal, or Hunger. This is why individual trinity vessels of particular enlightenment might begin to exhibit extraordinary abilities.
